title: Bicycles = Anti-Monarchy? Rail Workers Want Humane Treatment 09.15.22
itunes:title: Bicycles = Anti-Monarchy? Rail Workers Want Humane Treatment 09.15.22
description:
In episode 1331, Jack and Miles are joined by actor, comedian, musician and host of Cold Brew Got Me Like, Chris Crofton, to discuss… Rail Workers ready to STRIKE…biz media wants you to freak out! King Charles III: I’m Pretty Sure This Is Going to Be Very Funny And Very Convincing, The Queen’s Funeral Is Already A Sh-tshow and more!

  1. Rail Workers ready to STRIKE…biz media wants you to freak out! 
  2. Congress prepares to act on rail strike amid fears of ‘economic catastrophe’
  3. King Charles III: I’m Pretty Sure This Is Going to Be Very Funny And Very Convincing
  4. The Queen’s Funeral Is Already A Sh-tshow
  5. Queen Elizabeth's Coffin Makes Procession Through London Followed by Royal Family
  6. McDonald’s to close every UK restaurant for the Queen’s funeral
  7. Center Parcs backtracks over eviction of holidaymakers for Queen’s funeral
  8. Center Parcs backtracks on Queen's funeral closure plans
  9. Queen’s funeral could push U.K. into ‘technical recession’: economic forecast
  10. Hospital appointments cancelled because of Queen’s funeral

Buy The Advice King Anthology here.

LISTEN: Vilified by Stimulator Jones
